title: The Week of Linda Hayes: Heroic Planner
summary: Linda Hayes, a 20-year-old planner and coach, discovers her superpowers and saves her city from disaster over the span of a week.
summaryGerman: Linda Hayes, eine 20-jährige Planerin und Trainerin, entdeckt ihre Superkräfte und rettet ihre Stadt innerhalb einer Woche vor einer Katastrophe.
summaryDutch: Linda Hayes, een 20-jarige planner en coach, ontdekt haar superkrachten en redt haar stad van een ramp in de loop van een week.
summaryFrench: Linda Hayes, une planificatrice et coach de 20 ans, découvre ses superpuissances et sauve sa ville d'une catastrophe au cours d'une semaine.

story.text: Linda Hayes starts her week feeling energetic as she juggles her college courses and coaching responsibilities. A strange shimmer in her vision leads her to prevent a small accident at the gym, hinting at newfound abilities.
Her powers grow, and Linda feels an eerie sense as she begins to foresee minor future events. Her perfect plans help avert several small crises at her college.
Empowered and intrigued, Linda spends the day experimenting with and understanding her abilities. She successfully intervenes to prevent a major traffic accident foreseen in her visions.
Feeling romantic, Linda helps plan a surprise proposal for a friend, using her powers to ensure the evening goes flawlessly. Amidst the joy, she senses a looming threat.
An epic showdown unfolds as Linda confronts the source of the threat— a corrupt businessman planning to demolish a historic park. Her strategic planning leads to his arrest.
In the aftermath, Linda helps organize a community event to celebrate the park’s salvation. Her role as a new hero is solidified in her community.
Reflecting on her week, Linda feels peaceful, recognizing her potential to impact lives positively. She vows to use her powers for the greater good.

ending: And so, Linda Hayes embraced her role as the planner-hero, ready to tactically face any future adversities.
moral: Embrace your unique abilities to make a positive impact in your world.
